tool_description: Convert city locations to latitude/longitude coordinates and vice versa. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/geocoding and https://api-ninjas.com/api/reversegeocoding.
name: Geocoding by API-Ninjas
title: Geocoding by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/geocoding

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Country name, 2-letter ISO country code, or 3-letter ISO country code.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: US state (for United States cities only).

api_list.name: /v1/reversegeocoding
api_list.description: API Ninjas Reverse Geocoding API endpoint.
